tidbits.title: Emerald Isle
tidbits.description: Ireland is known as the 'Emerald Isle' for its lush green landscapes, rolling hills, and stunning natural beauty.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage, seen in its traditional music, dance (like Riverdance), folklore, and ancient Celtic history.

tidbits.title: Literary Legacy
tidbits.description: Ireland boasts a strong literary legacy with renowned writers like James Joyce, Oscar Wilde, and W.B. Yeats, contributing to its cultural identity.
